text: Akkineni Nageswara Rao (20 September 1923 â€“ 22 January 2014) was an Indian movie actor and producer. He worked in the Telugu cinema. He became a famous stage artiste. He was known for playing female characters because women at that time were prohibited from acting. Rao died on 22 January 2014 in Hyderabad from cancer aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Akkiineni Nageswara Rao Birthday Special Article in Telugu Language Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors
title: Akkineni Nageswara Rao
